EmailTemplate.name: Pregnancy Disclosure
EmailTemplate.subject: Pregnancy Disclosure Consent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PREGNANCY DISCLOSURE FORM
You have notified us that you are pregnant. We have a duty to ensure that each school, at which you carry out a temporary assignment, is aware of your pregnancy (in advance of you working there), in order that the school can carry out an assessment to identify any risks which may be posed to your health and safety by working in the role.
Please sign below to acknowledge your understanding of, and agreement to this disclosure and return.
Candidate Name
Candidate Signature
